package.name: cistrome_ceas

actions.action: cd published-packages/CEAS/ export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:$INSTALL_DIR/lib/python && python setup.py install --install-lib $INSTALL_DIR/lib/python --install-scripts $INSTALL_DIR/bin

package.readme:
Installs version 1.0.2 of CEAS from cistrome (commit id d8c0751, datestamp 20140929), which includes ceasBW (a version of ceas which can handle bigWig file input from MACS2.
Cistrome code is at https://bitbucket.org/cistrome/cistrome-applications-harvard/overview
The CEAS code is under the published-packages/CEAS/ subdirectory
Cistrome data files and documentation can be found at http://liulab.dfci.harvard.edu/CEAS/index.html
